body: Park Store              The Hawai?i Pacific Parks Association (HPPA) is a nonprofit cooperating association working in partnership with the National Park Service in Hawai?i and American Samoa. Proceeds from our park stores support interpretation, educational programs, research projects, publications, and cultural activities. The HPPA operates three bookstores at Haleakal? National Park and they are located at Park Headquarters, Haleakal? Visitor Center, and K?pahulu Visitor Center. The HPPA also maintains an online bookstore.  Hawai?i Pacific Parks Association P.O. Box 369 Makawao, HI 96768 808-572-4461 e-mail us
title: Haleakal? National Park: Bookstore
